japanese:
（上杉さんが上京して、
　私の大学生活が始まって――）
translation:
(After Uesugi-san went to Tokyo
 and my college life began%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （それから数ヶ月は、あっという間だった）
translation:
(The following months went by
 in the blink of an eye.)

japanese:
（最近やっと、自分が大学生なんだって
　実感が湧いてきた気がする）
translation:
(Recently, I finally feel like
 I'm actually a college student, and it's sinking in.)

japanese: （例えば、こんな時に……）
translation: (Like, in moments like these...)
Hmm...mmm...

japanese: レポート、苦戦しているみたいですね。
translation: Looks like you're struggling with your report.

japanese:
五月ぃ～。
そろそろ頭がパンクしちゃうよぉ～。
translation:
Itsukii!
I'm about to hit my limit.

japanese:
はあ……。
最初は、宿題みたいなものかな、とか
軽く考えてたんだけどね？
translation:
*sigh*
At first, I thought it would be like
high school homework, you know?

japanese:
やってるうちに、自分がなにを
書いているのかすらわからなくなってきたよ。
translation:
As I was doing it, I started to lose track
of what I was even writing about.

japanese:
そもそも、高校の宿題と大学のレポートでは
趣旨が違いますからね。
translation:
Besides, the focus is different
between high school assignments and college reports.

japanese:
提出日まであと一週間か～。
最低でもＣ評価は取りたいし……ここは頑張らないと。
translation:
There's only one more week until the deadline.
I want at least a C...
I have to work hard here.

japanese:
……あ。
あら、四葉、そろそろ時間では？
translation:
...Ah.
Yotsuba, isn't it time already?

japanese:
あ、ホントだ！
ありがとね、五月！
translation:
Oh, right!
Thanks, Itsuki!

japanese: 今日も頑張ってくださいね。
translation: Good luck today.

japanese: よし、早く準備しなきゃ。
translation: Alright, I have to get ready quickly.

japanese:
今日は上杉さんとの、
大切なオンライン授業の日だもんね。
translation:
Today is an important online class day
with Uesugi-san, after all.

japanese: （これは、２人の約束を叶えるための大切な時間）
translation: (This is an important time to fulfill our promise.)

japanese: え～と、授業でわからなかったところは……。
translation:
Hmm,
I didn't understand some parts of the lesson...

japanese:
あっ、そうだ！
いまやってるレポートのテーマについて
上杉さんの意見ももらっちゃおうかな？
translation:
Oh, I know!
Maybe I'll ask Uesugi-san for his opinion
on the theme of the report I'm working on right now.

japanese: でも、それ全部だと時間足りないな……。
translation: But, there's not enough time for everything...

japanese:
う～ん……。
もうちょっと勉強、できるようにならないと。
上杉さんに頼りきりになっちゃう。
translation:
Hmm...
I have to become better at studying.
I can't rely on Uesugi-san for everything.

japanese:
（勉強は相変わらず苦手だけど、
　その後には、一番のお楽しみタイムが待っている）
translation:
(I'm still bad at studying, but once I'm done with it,
 here comes my favorite time of the day.)

japanese: 終わったら、なんの話をしようかなー。
translation: What should we talk about after class?

japanese:
新しく買った服がみんなに不評なこととか、
学食の焼肉定食が美味しかったこととか！
translation:
Like, if the new clothes I bought were
unpopular with everyone, or if the beef bowl
at the school cafeteria was delicious!

japanese:
あれ？
なんか私の話題、パッとしない気がする。
translation:
Hmm?
Somehow, my topics don't seem very interesting.

japanese: ここは恋人同士らしい会話に挑戦して……。
translation: Let's try to have a conversation like lovers...

japanese:
まだ私には難しいかぁ。
よし、今日の話題は上杉さんに任せちゃおう。
translation:
I'm not quite ready for that yet.
Alright, I'll leave today's topic to Uesugi-san.

japanese:
（高校生の頃のような、身近な日常の話題。
　些細でくだらないけど、なぜか楽しい会話）
translation:
(Small, trivial everyday topics,
 like when we were in high school.
 Although insignificant, it was a fun conversation.)

japanese:
（そのおかげで、距離は離れていても
　気持ちは近くにあるように感じられた）
translation:
(Thanks to that, even though we're apart,
 I feel like he was sitting right next to me.)

japanese: ……でも、やっぱり会いたいなぁ。
translation: ...But, I still want to see you.

japanese: 風太郎……。
translation: Futaro...

japanese:
……ん？
チャットメッセージ？
translation:
...Hm?
A text?

japanese: 『俺もだ』
translation:
WHAAA?!
U-U-Uesugi-san? Why?!

japanese:
んんっ！？
う、う、上杉さん？　なんで！？
translation: What?! When did that happen?!

japanese: 『お前のほう、ＯＮになってるぞ』
translation: So, just wait a moment.]

japanese: えっ？　あれ！？　いつの間に！？
translation: U-um, when did you start listening in?

japanese: 『こっちも準備するから、ちょっと待ってろ』
translation:
Ah, never mind! You don't have to say anything!
More importantly, just%p-2;――

japanese: あ、あの、どの辺から聞いて……。
translation: Please take care of me today!
